languages.text:
"- Джен, ты слышала? Эта тварь скоро притащит очередную порцию ксенотеха. Вот заживем!
- Придурок, мы еще с прошлой поставкой не разобрались. Клиенты больше не хотят рисковать после... ну, после тех случаев.
- Да плевать! Безмозглые богачи в любой системе найдутся. Главное что? Правильно. Главное — что мы троны сундуками гребем.
- Плохое у меня предчувствие.
- Физиономию сделай попроще, Джен! Или скоро станешь похожа на нашего морщинистого поставщика... Или поставщицу?"

languages.text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.
- Who cares! There are people with more money than common sense in every system. You know what matters? That's right, what matters is that we are making mountains of thrones.
- I've got a bad feeling about this.
- Jen, turn that frown upside down! You'll start looking like our wrinkly supplier lad if you don't... Or is she our supplier lass? Whatever."

languages.text:
「- ジェン、聞いた？また異星技術が1箱くるらしいよ。だいぶ生活が楽になるなあ！
- バカね。まだ前の配達もまともに終わってないのに何考えてんの？あんな事故があった後じゃあ…客もリスクをとりたがらないよ。
- どうでもいいじゃん！あいつらに常識なんかないし。あるのは金だけ！こっちはしっかり金儲けできるから最高じゃん。
- 嫌な予感がする。
- ジェン、大丈夫だって！あんまりしかめっ面ばかりしてると、あの仕入れ先の女みたいにシワシワになっちゃうよ…って、仕入れ先の人だよね？まあ、いいや」
languages.original_text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.
- Who cares! There are people with more money than common sense in every system. You know what matters? That's right, what matters is that we are making mountains of thrones.
- I've got a bad feeling about this.

languages.text:
«- Jen, ¿te has enterado? Llega otra remesa de xenotecnología. ¡Nos vamos a dar la gran vida!
- Imbécil, todavía no nos hemos ocupado de la entrega anterior. Los clientes no quieren correr riesgos desde... bueno, los accidentes.
- ¡Qué más da! Hay gente con más dinero que sentido común en cualquier sistema. ¿Sabes lo que sí importa? Los montones de tronos que nos estamos llevando.
- Esto me da mala espina.
- Jen, ¡sonríe por una vez! Te van a salir tantas arrugas como a nuestro proveedor... ¿o es proveedora? Bueno, da igual».
languages.original_text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.
- Who cares! There are people with more money than common sense in every system. You know what matters? That's right, what matters is that we are making mountains of thrones.
- I've got a bad feeling about this.
- Jen, turn that frown upside down! You'll start looking like our wrinkly supplier lad if you don't... Or is she our supplier lass? Whatever."

- Jen, ¡sonríe por una vez! Te van a salir tantas arrugas como a nuestro proveedor... ¿o es proveedora? Bueno, da igual».

languages.text:
“- 简，你听说了吗？他们会带来一批新的异形制品。咱们要过上好日子了！
- 白痴，上一批货物还没处理完呢。客户不打算在那次……咳，那次事故之后继续冒险了。
- 我才不管呢！哪个星系都不缺有钱的冤大头。最重要的是什么？没错，最重要的是我们要赚上一大笔王座币！
- 我有种不好的预感。
- 简，别再愁眉苦脸的了！不然你就要变得像那个供应商一样，变成个皱巴巴的老头子了！……噢，也可能是个老太婆？随便吧。”
languages.original_text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.

languages.text:
« Jen, t'as entendu la nouvelle ? Ils vont nous apporter une nouvelle cargaison de xénotechnologies. On va avoir la belle vie !
– Imbécile, on n'a même pas encore écoulé la cargaison précédente. Les clients ne veulent plus prendre de risque depuis les... accidents.
– On s'en fout ! Il y a des gens avec plus d'argent que de jugeote dans tous les systèmes. Tu sais ce qui compte vraiment ? C'est les montagnes de trônes qu'on va se faire !
– J'ai un mauvais pressentiment.
– Oh, Jen, détends-toi un peu ! Si tu continues à faire la tête, tu vas finir par avoir autant de rides que notre fournisseur... Enfin, peut-être que c'est une fournisseuse, d'ailleurs. Bref. »
languages.original_text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.

- I've got a bad feeling about this.
- Jen, turn that frown upside down! You'll start looking like our wrinkly supplier lad if you don't... Or is she our supplier lass? Whatever."

languages.text:
"- Jen, habt Ihr schon gehört? Sie schicken noch eine Ladung Xenotech. Das wird ein tolles Leben!
- Idiot, wir haben noch nicht einmal die letzte Lieferung erledigt. Die Kunden wollen kein Risiko eingehen, nach ... Na ja, nach den Unfällen.
- Wen juckt's?! Es gibt in jedem System Leute mit mehr Geld als Verstand. Wisst Ihr, was wichtig ist? Ganz genau, wichtig ist nur, dass wir Berge von Thronmünzen sammeln.
- Ich habe kein gutes Gefühl bei der Sache.
- Kopf hoch, Jen! Lächeln! Sonst seht Ihr bald noch aus wie unser runzliger Lieferant ... Oder ist es eine Lieferantin? Egal."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"- Jen, duydun mu? Yeni bir zeno teknolojisi partisi daha yoldaymış. Hayat bize güzel!
- Salak mısın? Önceki teslimatla işimiz bitmedi daha. Müşterilerimiz de riske girmiyor, sonuçta... Sonuçta kazalar ortada.
- Çok da umurumdaydı! Her sistemde aklından çok parası olan birileri var. Çaktın mı? Burada asıl mesele, dünya kadar gelt kazanacak olmamız.
- Bu işte bir iş var.
- Jen, somurtma artık! Daha fazla somurtursan bize malları sağlayan adama benzersin... Yoksa kadın mı o? Neyse ne."
languages.original_text:
"- Jen, did you hear? They're going to bring in another batch of xenotech. Life is going to be good!
- Idiot, we still haven't dealt with the previous delivery. The clients don't wish to take risks after... Well, after the accidents.
- Who cares! There are people with more money than common sense in every system. You know what matters? That's right, what matters is that we are making mountains of thrones.
- I've got a bad feeling about this.
- Jen, turn that frown upside down! You'll start looking like our wrinkly supplier lad if you don't... Or is she our supplier lass? Whatever."
